definition: not in the least concerned (idiom)/reckless/couldn't give a damn about it/unperturbed/couldn't care less/harum scarum
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: He thinks nothing of throwing away a thousand dollars at the gambling house.
sentences.chinese: 他在赌场里一掷千金满不在乎。

sentences.english: Your two of a kind, neither of you care about detail nor domestics.
sentences.chinese: 你们是两个同类，都对家事和细节满不在乎。

sentences.english: He strode out toward the friar, who gave him one glance and then went on eating unconcernedly .
sentences.chinese: 他走向僧侣，他看了一下，又满不在乎继续吃着。

sentences.english: Nonchalant she said that tomorrow I will give you the best gift.
sentences.chinese: 她却满不在乎的说，我明天会给你一个最好的礼物。

sentences.english: Events have imbued the Japanese corporate warrior with a new insouciance.
sentences.chinese: 当初日本公司的斗士已经变得满不在乎。

sentences.english: He did not scruple to use it.
sentences.chinese: 他满不在乎地打算用这笔钱。

sentences.english: However, do not deem that they are not interested in status.
sentences.chinese: 但是不要以为他们对身份地位就满不在乎。

sentences.english: He was niggled by her careless attitude.
sentences.chinese: 她满不在乎的态度把他给激怒了。

sentences.english: People feel uncared for and no one gives a damn.
sentences.chinese: 民众有被漠视之感，不作为者却满不在乎。

sentences.english: He had whistled in a masterful, careless way, and they had come to him.
sentences.chinese: 那时他只需神气活现满不在乎地吹吹口哨她们就来了。

definition: as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
joyfully satisfied/to be immensely proud of oneself/proudly/an air of complacency
to disdain to do sth/to think sth not worth doing/to feel it beneath one's dignity
not to accept as correct (idiom); to object/to disapprove/to take exception to
to pay no attention to/not to mind
to not mind (at all, a bit)/to not care in the slightest
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
